Hi all.
I am in the midst of creating a system to handle conversion of ARCR=
ecords.
Then when I have finished converting the contents of the ARCRecord,=

I need the values of uri,contenttype, hostIP, recordLength and
fetchBeginT=
imeStamp, that is used
as arguments to the ARCWriter.write() method.

I can=
 get at most of them by using

ARCRecordMetaData meta =3D anArcRecord.getMe=
tadata();
hostIP =3D meta.getIP();
contenttype =3D meta.getMimetype()
 uri =
=3D meta.getUrl();
recordLength =3D meta.getLength

Maybe meta.getDate() re=
presents the same information as
fetchBeginTimeStamp,
but then I have the p=
roblem of converting the date to a long

I hope, anyone can help me here.

=
regards
